### replaceBinOpShuffles() {#abcca7aba196d68ce10fa885c7827fb95}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool InterleavedAccessImpl::replaceBinOpShuffles (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/shufflevectorinst">ShuffleVectorInst</a> &#42; &gt; BinOpShuffles, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/shufflevectorinst">ShuffleVectorInst</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; Shuffles, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loadinst">LoadInst</a> &#42; LI)</>}>
Given a number of shuffles of the form shuffle(binop(x,y)), convert them to binop(shuffle(x), shuffle(y)) to allow the formation of an interleaving load.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/any">Any</a> newly created shuffles that operate on <code>LI</code> will be added to <code>Shuffles</code>. Returns true, if any changes to the IR have been made.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/interleavedaccesspass-cpp/#l00132">132</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/interleavedaccesspass-cpp">InterleavedAccessPass.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### tryReplaceExtracts() {#ae50a889f6997ce638bf14d267d283bb3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool InterleavedAccessImpl::tryReplaceExtracts (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/extractelementinst">ExtractElementInst</a> &#42; &gt; Extracts, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/shufflevectorinst">ShuffleVectorInst</a> &#42; &gt; Shuffles)</>}>
Returns true if the uses of an interleaved load by the extractelement instructions in <code>Extracts</code> can be replaced by uses of the shufflevector instructions in <code>Shuffles</code> instead.

If so, the necessary replacements are also performed.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/interleavedaccesspass-cpp/#l00124">124</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/interleavedaccesspass-cpp">InterleavedAccessPass.cpp</a>.
